contents:
7/25示威10周年发呢啲战狼Post，我唔知系笑定喊好？！
2010/7/25回带
不如我学侵侵回复下佢：
That's the MOST NASTY GUY I EVER MET. I never say Latinx can't speak Spanish to make them More American, I just don't want too much Bad Hombres in this country. And still, our country's welcoming every freedom-loving Chinese people to came to America for the Stuff They Need to Rebuild Their Country, without banning their language. That guy's gone too far!
